definitions: The act of inhaling and exhaling the smoke of tobacco or a similar substance.
The act of curing or preserving food by exposure to smoke.
To draw in and expel the smoke of tobacco or another substance.
To cure or flavor (food) by exposure to smoke.
examples: Smoking is prohibited in this area.
He enjoys smoking a pipe after dinner.
They were smoking the salmon for the feast.
The chimney was smoking all morning.
